{"body":"<p>We are developing an AngularJS application with ES6 modules. We're using webpack and babel to transform and package our code, with the <code>babel-plugin-angularjs-annotate</code> plugin used to automatically handle DI.</p>\n<p>The issue arises on a single service, let's call it <code>MainController</code>. Its dependencies are <code>$log</code>, <code>$scope</code>, <code>$uibModal</code>, and <code>MainApi</code>, which is a custom service.</p>\n<p>Decorating this exported function with <code>/* @ngAnnotate */</code> results with the following:</p>\n<pre class=\"lang-js prettyprint-override\"><code>var MainController = function ($log, $scope, $uibModal, _MainApi) { /*...*/ }\n// -----------------------------------------------------^ Why the underscore?\nMainController.$inject = ['$log', '$scope', '$uibModal', '_MainApi'];\n// -------------------------------------------------------^ Why the underscore?\nexport default MainController;\n</code></pre>\n<p>As you can see, instead of <code>MainApi</code> being injected, it is transformed into <code>_MainApi</code>.\nOther services in other parts of the code also rely on <code>MainApi</code>, and it is properly injected into those services.</p>\n<p>Removing the <code>/* @ngInject */</code> &quot;decorator&quot; also removes the <code>$inject</code> part of the code, which, naturally, does not work either.</p>\n<p>What causes that single injection argument to get prefixed and how do we prevent that from happening? Again, literally every single other DI component is injected properly and works, except for this one instance.</p>\n<p>Here is our <code>.babelrc</code></p>\n<pre class=\"lang-json prettyprint-override\"><code>{\n    &quot;presets&quot;: [\n        [\n            &quot;@babel/preset-env&quot;,\n            {\n                &quot;targets&quot;: {\n                    &quot;browsers&quot;: [&quot;last 2 versions&quot;, &quot;safari &gt;= 7&quot;]\n                }\n            }\n        ],\n        [&quot;@babel/preset-react&quot;]\n    ],\n    &quot;plugins&quot;: [[&quot;angularjs-annotate&quot;, { &quot;explicitOnly&quot;: true }]]\n}\n</code></pre>\n<p>And webpack config</p>\n<pre class=\"lang-js prettyprint-override\"><code>const path = require('path');\n\nvar pluginCopy = require('./webpack/plugin-copy-docker');\nvar loadEnv = require('./webpack/load-env');\nvar rules = require('./webpack/module-rules');\nvar PACKAGE = require('./package.json');\nvar version = PACKAGE.version;\nvar zipPlugin = require('webpack-zip-files-plugin');\n\nmodule.exports = function ( env) {\n    var config = loadEnv( env.ENV);\n    var configFilename = '__config.php';\n\n    return {\n        mode: config['ENV_MODE'],\n        entry: {\n            main: path.resolve('app/proto', 'app.js'),\n        },\n        output: {\n            path: path.resolve(__dirname, 'dist/www'),\n        },\n        module: {\n            rules: rules,\n        },\n        resolve: {\n            alias: {\n                'jquery-ui': 'jquery-ui-dist/jquery-ui.js'\n            }\n        },\n        plugins: [\n            pluginCopy(configFilename),\n            new zipPlugin({\n                entries: [\n                    { src: path.join(__dirname, './dist'), dist: './' },\n                ],\n                output: path.join(__dirname, './proto-docker-v'+version),\n                format: 'zip',\n            })\n        ],\n    };\n};\n</code></pre>\n<p>Here are the rules</p>\n<pre class=\"lang-js prettyprint-override\"><code>const path = require('path')\n\nmodule.exports =  [\n    {\n        test: /\\.(js|jsx)$/, exclude: /node_modules/,\n        use: {\n            loader: 'babel-loader',\n            options: {\n                presets: ['@babel/preset-env']\n            }\n        }\n    },\n    {\n        test: /\\.html$/, exclude: /node_modules/, loader: 'html-loader'\n    },\n    {\n        test: /\\.css$/,\n        loader: [ 'style-loader', 'css-loader'],\n    },\n    {\n        test: /\\.woff(2)?(\\?v=[0-9]\\.[0-9]\\.[0-9])?$/,\n        loader: 'url-loader?limit=10000&amp;minetype=application/font-woff',\n    },\n    {\n        test: /\\.(ttf|eot|svg|png)(\\?v=[0-9]\\.[0-9]\\.[0-9])?$/,\n        loader: 'file-loader',\n    },\n    {\n        test: /\\.scss$/,\n        use: ['style-loader', 'css-loader', 'sass-loader'],\n    },\n    {\n        test: /\\.svg$/,\n        use: ['svg-inline-loader'],\n    }\n]\n</code></pre>\n","userId":1,"threadId":281,"question_id":65005074,"isQuestion":true,"score":0},
{"body":"<p>I tried the following code (code is from <a href=\"https://gist.github.com/thorsten/148812e9cc4fb6a19215ce22afd4e5a8\" rel=\"nofollow noreferrer\">here</a>) which can change the value of <code>navigator.userAgent</code> in browsers, and it works fine! after running this code, when I check the value of <code>navigator.userAgent</code>, it is changed to the new value. but then when I send a post request with <code>ajax</code>, the <code>user-agent</code> header which is automatically sent with my request, has not changed and is the actual user agent of the browser. why the user agent has not changed for ajax request?</p>\n<pre><code>function setUserAgent(window, userAgent) {\n// Works on Firefox, Chrome, Opera and IE9+\nif (navigator.__defineGetter__) {\n    navigator.__defineGetter__('userAgent', function () {\n        return userAgent;\n    });\n} else if (Object.defineProperty) {\n    Object.defineProperty(navigator, 'userAgent', {\n        get: function () {\n            return userAgent;\n        }\n    });\n}\n// Works on Safari\nif (window.navigator.userAgent !== userAgent) {\n    var userAgentProp = {\n        get: function () {\n            return userAgent;\n        }\n    };\n    try {\n        Object.defineProperty(window.navigator, 'userAgent', userAgentProp);\n    } catch (e) {\n        window.navigator = Object.create(navigator, {\n            userAgent: userAgentProp\n        });\n    }\n}\n}\n</code></pre>\n","userId":1,"threadId":284,"question_id":65004984,"isQuestion":true,"score":0},
{"body":"<p>Hello guys I need help with high-order function called ’find’ that takes two arguments – an array and a function.It will loop through the array and call the function that was sent as argument once for every value in the array. If the argument-function returns ‘true’ at some point during the loop then the find function will return that value.</p>\n<p><div class=\"snippet\" data-lang=\"js\" data-hide=\"false\" data-console=\"true\" data-babel=\"false\">\r\n<div class=\"snippet-code\">\r\n<pre class=\"snippet-code-js lang-js prettyprint-override\"><code>function f(n) {\n  return n &gt; 2\n}\n\nfunction find(array, predicate) {\n  for (let i=0; i&lt; array.length; i++) {    \n    if (predicate(i) === false) {\n        //do nothing\n} \nreturn i \n    \n}\n\nconsole.log(find([1, 2, 3], f))\n//this is supposed to log 3 as an answer</code></pre>\r\n</div>\r\n</div>\r\n</p>\n<p>So far i get 0 as an answer and I cant seem to figure out how to make the loop stop when the boolean becomes True. {"body":"<p>I have taken over a Vue.js project from someone else and am experiencing some cross-browser issues with the bundled javascript code. I am not an expert in Babel, and suspect that maybe some configuration is incorrect?</p>\n<p>I can run the Vue.js website locally on my own dev machine, and I can publish it as an Azure web app.\nTesting the website gives the following results:</p>\n<ul>\n<li>Chrome: Runs fine, when hosted locally and in Azure.</li>\n<li>IE 11: Runs fine, when hosted locally, but fails when hosted in Azure.</li>\n<li>Safari: Fails when hosted in Azure (have not tried locally)</li>\n</ul>\n<p>What surprises me, is that IE 11 works fine, when the website is hosted locally, but fails when the website is hosted in Azure. It's the same bundled js file.</p>\n<p>When the website is hosted in Azure, both IE and Safari fail on the same line in the bundled js file. The IE error message is:</p>\n<pre><code>SCRIPT5018: Unexpected quantifier\n</code></pre>\n<p>The Safari error message is:</p>\n<pre><code>SyntaxError: Invalid regular expression: nothing to repeat\n</code></pre>\n<p>The code line with the error is this:</p>\n<pre><code>,&quot;./node_modules/moment/locale/ar-dz.js&quot;:function(n,t,i){\n//! moment.js locale configuration\n//! locale : Arabic (Algeria) [ar-dz]\n//! author : Amine Roukh: https://github.com/Amine27\n//! author : Abdel Said: https://github.com/abdelsaid\n//! author : Ahmed Elkhatib\n//! author : forabi https://github.com/forabi\n//! author : Noureddine LOUAHEDJ : https://github.com/noureddinem\n(function(n,t){t(i(&quot;./node_modules/moment/moment.js&quot;))})(this,function(n){&quot;use strict&quot;;\n//! moment.js locale configuration\nvar i=function(n){return n===0?0:n===1?1:n===2?2:n%100&gt;=3&amp;&amp;n%100&lt;=10?3:n%100&gt;=11?4:5},u={s:[&quot;??? {"body":"<p>I want to be able to add user input text in each cell (under the day) of a calendar and display them until the page session ends. id=&quot;previous&quot; onclick=&quot;previous()&quot;&gt;Previous&lt;/button&gt;\n                &lt;button class=&quot;btn btn-outline-primary col-sm-6&quot; id=&quot;next&quot; onclick=&quot;next()&quot;&gt;Next&lt;/button&gt;\n                &lt;button class=&quot;btn btn-outline-primary col-sm-6&quot; id=&quot;today&quot; onclick=&quot;displayToday()&quot;&gt;Today&lt;/button&gt;\n            &lt;/div&gt;\n            &lt;br /&gt;\n            &lt;form class=&quot;form-inline&quot;&gt;\n                &lt;label class=&quot;lead mr-2 ml-2&quot; for=&quot;month&quot;&gt;Jump To: &lt;/label&gt;\n                &lt;select class=&quot;form-control col-sm-4&quot; name=&quot;month&quot; id=&quot;month&quot; onchange=&quot;jump()&quot;&gt;\n                    &lt;option value=0&gt;Jan&lt;/option&gt;\n                    &lt;option value=1&gt;Feb&lt;/option&gt;\n                    &lt;option value=2&gt;Mar&lt;/option&gt;\n                    &lt;option value=3&gt;Apr&lt;/option&gt;\n                    &lt;option value=4&gt;May&lt;/option&gt;\n                    &lt;option value=5&gt;Jun&lt;/option&gt;\n                    &lt;option value=6&gt;Jul&lt;/option&gt;\n                    &lt;option value=7&gt;Aug&lt;/option&gt;\n                    &lt;option value=8&gt;Sep&lt;/option&gt;\n                    &lt;option value=9&gt;Oct&lt;/option&gt;\n                    &lt;option value=10&gt;Nov&lt;/option&gt;\n                    &lt;option value=11&gt;Dec&lt;/option&gt;\n                &lt;/select&gt;\n                &lt;label for=&quot;year&quot;&gt;&lt;/label&gt;&lt;select class=&quot;form-control col-sm-4&quot; name=&quot;year&quot; id=&quot;year&quot; onchange=&quot;jump()&quot;&gt;\n                    &lt;option value=2018&gt;2018&lt;/option&gt;\n                    &lt;option value=2019&gt;2019&lt;/option&gt;\n                    &lt;option value=2020&gt;2020&lt;/option&gt;\n                    &lt;option value=2021&gt;2021&lt;/option&gt;\n                    &lt;option value=2022&gt;2022&lt;/option&gt;\n                &lt;/select&gt;\n            &lt;/form&gt;\n        &lt;/div&gt;\n    &lt;/div&gt;\n    &lt;!--&lt;button name=&quot;jump&quot; onclick=&quot;jump()&quot;&gt;Go&lt;/button&gt;--&gt;\n    &lt;script src=&quot;script.js&quot;&gt;&lt;/script&gt;\n\n&lt;/body&gt;\n&lt;/html&gt;\n</code></pre>\n<p>script.js</p>\n<pre><code>let today = new Date();\nlet currentMonth = today.getMonth();\nlet currentYear = today.getFullYear();\nlet selectYear = document.getElementById(&quot;year&quot;);\nlet selectMonth = document.getElementById(&quot;month&quot;);\n\nlet months = [&quot;Jan&quot;, &quot;Feb&quot;, &quot;Mar&quot;, &quot;Apr&quot;, &quot;May&quot;, &quot;Jun&quot;, &quot;Jul&quot;, &quot;Aug&quot;, &quot;Sep&quot;, &quot;Oct&quot;, &quot;Nov&quot;, &quot;Dec&quot;];\n\nlet monthAndYear = document.getElementById(&quot;monthAndYear&quot;);\nshowCalendar(currentMonth, currentYear);\n\nfunction next() {\n    currentYear = (currentMonth === 11) ? currentYear + 1 : currentYear;\n    currentMonth = (currentMonth + 1) % 12;\n    showCalendar(currentMonth, currentYear);\n}\n\nfunction previous() {\n    currentYear = (currentMonth === 0) ? currentYear - 1 : currentYear;\n    currentMonth = (currentMonth === 0) ? 11 : currentMonth - 1;\n    showCalendar(currentMonth, currentYear);\n}\n\nfunction displayToday() {\n    currentYear = today.getFullYear();\n    currentMonth = today.getMonth();\n    showCalendar(currentMonth, currentYear);\n}\n\nfunction jump() {\n    currentYear = parseInt(selectYear.value);\n    currentMonth = parseInt(selectMonth.value);\n    showCalendar(currentMonth, currentYear);\n}\n\nfunction showCalendar(month, year) {\n\n    let firstDay = (new Date(year, month)).getDay();\n    let daysInMonth = 32 - new Date(year, month, 32).getDate();\n\n    let tbl = document.getElementById(&quot;calendar-body&quot;); // body of the calendar\n\n    // clearing all previous cells\n    tbl.innerHTML = &quot;&quot;;\n\n    // filing data about month and in the page via DOM.\n    monthAndYear.innerHTML = months[month] + &quot; &quot; + year;\n    selectYear.value = year;\n    selectMonth.value = month;\n\n    // creating all cells\n    let date = 1;\n    for (let i = 0; i &lt; 6; i++) {\n        // creates a table row\n        let row = document.createElement(&quot;tr&quot;);\n\n        //creating individual cells, filing them up with data.\n        for (let j = 0; j &lt; 7; j++) {\n            if (i === 0 &amp;&amp; j &lt; firstDay) {\n                let cell = document.createElement(&quot;td&quot;);\n                let cellText = document.createTextNode(&quot;&quot;);\n                cell.appendChild(cellText);\n                row.appendChild(cell);\n            }\n            else if (date &gt; daysInMonth) {\n                break;\n            }\n                \n            else {\n                let cell = document.createElement(&quot;td&quot;);\n                let textnode = document.createTextNode(date);\n                console.log(&quot;date &quot; + date);\n\n                cell.addEventListener('click', function () {\n                    let userTextArea = document.createElement(&quot;textarea&quot;);\n                    let idDate = date + today.getMonth() + today.getFullYear();\n                    userTextArea.setAttribute(&quot;id&quot;, idDate);\n\n                    userTextArea.addEventListener('input', function () {\n                        localStorage.setItem(idDate, event.target.value); // store user input with the date as key when updated\n                    });\n\n                    // Retrieve stored user input if any\n                    try {\n                        var x = localStorage.getItem(idDate);\n                        document.getElementById(idDate).innerHTML = x;\n                    }\n                    catch (e) {\n                        if (e instanceof TypeError) {\n                            console.log(&quot;TypeError: &quot; + e.message);\n                        } else {\n                            throw e;\n                        }\n                    }\n\n                    cell.appendChild(userTextArea);\n                    cell.removeEventListener('click', popOneTimeAlert);\n                 }, \n                 { once: true }\n                );              \n\n                // color today's date\n                if (date === today.getDate() &amp;&amp; year === today.getFullYear() &amp;&amp; month === today.getMonth()) {\n                    cell.classList.add(&quot;bg-info&quot;);\n                }\n\n                cell.appendChild(textnode);\n                row.appendChild(cell);\n\n                date++;\n            }\n        }\n\n        tbl.appendChild(row); // appending each row into calendar body.\n    }\n}\n</code></pre>\n","userId":1,"threadId":301,"question_id":65004501,"isQuestion":true,"score":0},
{"body":"<p>I want to add a new div when click on a li or link</p>\n<p>The problem is when I click on the first div it works. But I want to add a div when an immediate previous li is clicked. Suppose, when I click on &quot;1&quot; a new div &quot;2&quot; will create. Then if I click on &quot;2&quot; a new div &quot;3&quot; will open and so on.\nAfter that, If I click on any previous div, all the divs will close except the next div and previous divs. Suppose, there are 1,2,3,4,5 div open. If I click on 2, only 1,2,3 div will visible. others will hide.</p>\n<p>How can I do that?</p>\n<p><div class=\"snippet\" data-lang=\"js\" data-hide=\"false\" data-console=\"true\" data-babel=\"false\">\r\n<div class=\"snippet-code\">\r\n<pre class=\"snippet-code-js lang-js prettyprint-override\"><code>$('.title').on('click', function(e) {\n  var isPresent = false;\n  var whoIsIt = $(this).attr('data');\n  $('#data .data').each(function(index, element) {\n    if ($(this).attr('data-conversation-between') == whoIsIt) {\n      isPresent = true;\n    }\n  });\n  if (!isPresent) {\n    $('#data').append('&lt;div class=\"data\" data-conversation-between=\"' + whoIsIt + '\"&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li class=\"title\"&gt;&lt;a  href=\"#\"&gt;&lt;img src=\"img/1.jpg\" class=\"profile\" alt=\"\"&gt;&lt;div class=\"details\"&gt; &lt;p&gt;Tusher&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Designation&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/a&gt; &lt;/li&gt;&lt;/ul&gt; &lt;/div&gt;');\n  }\n});\n\n$(document).ready(function() {\n  $(\"li\").click(function() {\n    $(\"li\").removeClass(\"active\");\n    $(this).parent().prepend($(this));\n    $(this).addClass(\"active\");\n  });\n});</code></pre>\r\n<pre class=\"snippet-code-css lang-css prettyprint-override\"><code>ul {\n  padding: 0px;\n}\n\n.data {\n  border: 1px solid;\n  margin: 5px;\n  float: left;\n  width: 13%;\n}\n\n.data a {\n  text-decoration: none;\n}\n\n.data ul {\n  list-style-type: none;\n}\n\n.profile {\n  height: 40px;\n  width: 40px;\n  float: left;\n  margin: 0px 13px;\n}\n\n.details {\n  font-size: 13px;\n}\n\nli.title {\n  border-bottom: 2px solid #ddd;\n  overflow: hidden;\n  margin-bottom: 5px;\n  padding: 5px 0;\n}\n\n.active {\n  background: #ececec;\n}\n\np {\n  margin: 0px;\n  padding: 0px;\n}</code></pre>\r\n<pre class=\"snippet-code-html lang-html prettyprint-override\"><code>&lt;script src=\"https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/jquery/3.3.1/jquery.min.js\"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;\n&lt;div class=\"main\"&gt;\n  &lt;div class=\"data\"&gt;\n    &lt;ul&gt;\n      &lt;li class=\"title\"&gt;\n        &lt;a href=\"#\"&gt;\n          &lt;img src=\"img/1.jpg\" class=\"profile\" alt=\"\"&gt;\n          &lt;div class=\"details\"&gt;\n            &lt;p&gt;Tusher&lt;/p&gt;\n            &lt;p&gt;Designation&lt;/p&gt;\n          &lt;/div&gt;\n        &lt;/a&gt;\n      &lt;/li&gt;\n\n    &lt;/ul&gt;\n  &lt;/div&gt;\n  &lt;div id=\"data\"&gt;\n\n  &lt;/div&gt;</code></pre>\r\n</div>\r\n</div>\r\n</p>\n","userId":1,"threadId":302,"question_id":65004469,"isQuestion":true,"score":0},
{"body":"<p>I try to pass a <code>children</code> and <code>props</code> to my component, the children pass well, but the props come like undefined, I cannot figure why.  When I don't use children that's work fine. A little snippet to understand the problem.\n<code>the function</code></p>\n<pre><code>import React from &quot;react&quot;;\n\nexport function PropsChildren({ children }, props) {\n  console.log(&quot;info props&quot;, props.name, props.age);\n  return (\n    &lt;div&gt;\n      &lt;p&gt;Props name is {props.name}&lt;/p&gt;\n      &lt;p&gt;Props age is {props.age}&lt;/p&gt;\n    &lt;/div&gt;\n  );\n}\n</code></pre>\n<p><code>the call</code></p>\n<pre><code>import React from &quot;react&quot;;\nimport ReactDOM from &quot;react-dom&quot;;\nimport &quot;./index.css&quot;;\n//import App from './App';\nimport reportWebVitals from &quot;./reportWebVitals&quot;;\nimport { PropsChildren } from &quot;./props/props_children&quot;;\n\nReactDOM.render(\n  &lt;React.StrictMode&gt;\n    &lt;PropsChildren name=&quot;Knupel&quot; age={46}&gt;\n      {document}\n    &lt;/PropsChildren&gt;\n  &lt;/React.StrictMode&gt;,\n  document.getElementById(&quot;root&quot;)\n);\n</code></pre>\n<p>console return\n<code>info props undefined undefined</code></p>\n","userId":1,"threadId":303,"question_id":65004448,"isQuestion":true,"score":0},

{"body":"<p>I need to add spaces between 3 digits as a separator and add a currency symbol for CZK, it is a dynamic code, that you add values into input - delka_penze and mesicni_renta and that will count the number with  a result like this: 9000000</p>\n<p>I have this code</p>\n<pre><code>$(function() {\n   $(&quot;input[name='delka_penze'], input[name='mesicni_renta']&quot;).keyup(function() {\n       var castka_penze_2p_inflace3_round = (castka_penze_2p_inflace3 / 1000).toFixed() * 1000;\n       $(&quot;input[name='castka_penze_inflace3']&quot;).val(castka_penze_inflace3_round)\n  });\n});\n</code></pre>\n<p>I need add paces after 3 digits and add currency - CZK so i want result 9 000 000 Kč</p>\n<p>Edit:\nI tried this so fat</p>\n<pre><code>$(this).val(x.toString().replace(/ /g, &quot;&quot;).replace(/\\B(?=(\\d{3})+(?!\\d))/g, &quot; &quot;));\n</code></pre>\n<p>but i dont know how put it together with dynamic input from jQuery.</p>\n<p>Thank you</p>\n","userId":1,"threadId":305,"question_id":65004407,"isQuestion":true,"score":0},
{"body":"<p>Hey guys how are you doing ? So i have one problem that i don't know if it is a bug, i have a scroll list with diferent items, and each item has a button wich i can press to open a modal with details of this item and also i can modify this item. After this is was changed by the user i save the data of the item in a AsyncStorage and i update the items of the scroll list to show the item modified. The problem is that when i press in the button to modify any item again the modal stop working, and it won't show up anymore.\nthis is the code:</p>\n<pre><code>import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';\nimport {\n    View,\n    Text,\n    StyleSheet,\n    ScrollView,\n    AsyncStorage,\n    Image,\n    ActivityIndicator,\n    Modal,\n    TouchableHighlight,\n    TouchableOpacity,\n    Alert\n} from 'react-native';\nimport { Picker } from '@react-native-community/picker';\nimport { LinearGradient } from 'expo-linear-gradient';\nimport { RectButton } from 'react-native-gesture-handler';\nimport { Feather } from '@expo/vector-icons';\nimport { useNavigation } from '@react-navigation/native';\nimport convertToReals from '../functions/convertToReals';\n\n\nexport default function ShowBag() {\n\n    const navigation = useNavigation();\n\n    const [listProducts, setListProducts] = useState(\n        &lt;ActivityIndicator size='large' color='#8FA7B2' /&gt;);\n    const [modalView, setModalView] = useState(false);\n    const [pickerValue, setPickerValue] = useState(0);\n    const [selectedProduct, setSelectedProduct] = useState({});\n    const [totalPrice, setTotalPrice] = useState(0);\n    const [reloadList, setReloadList] = useState(false);\n    const [reloadModal, setReloadModal] = useState(false);\n\n    const toggleModalView = async () =&gt; {\n\n        await setModalView(!modalView);\n    }\n\n    const handleSelectProduct = async (product) =&gt; {\n\n        console.log(product.chosenQuantity);\n        setSelectedProduct(product);\n        setPickerValue(product.chosenQuantity);\n\n    }\n\n    const calculateTotal = async () =&gt; {\n\n        const products = JSON.parse(await AsyncStorage.getItem('@storage_bag'));\n        let total = 0;\n\n        products.forEach(product =&gt; {\n            total = total + product.chosenQuantity * product.price\n        })\n\n        setTotalPrice(total);\n\n    }\n\n    useEffect(() =&gt; {\n\n        (async function autoLoad() {\n            const products = JSON.parse(await AsyncStorage.getItem('@storage_bag'));\n\n            if (products.length === 0) {\n                setListProducts(&lt;Text\n                    style={{\n                        fontFamily: 'Nunito_700Bold',\n                        fontSize: 26,\n                        color: '#8FA7B2',\n                        textAlign: 'center',\n                        marginTop: 40\n                    }}\n                &gt;Você não tem item na sacola.&lt;/Text&gt;)\n            } else {\n\n                const listBag = products.map((product, index) =&gt; {\n                    return (\n                        &lt;View key={index} style={styles.mainItemContainer}&gt;\n                            &lt;View style={styles.leftContainerItem}&gt;\n                                &lt;Image source={product.path} style={styles.logoItem} /&gt;\n                            &lt;/View&gt;\n                            &lt;View style={styles.middleContainerItem}&gt;\n                                &lt;Text style={styles.textNameItem}&gt;\n                                    {product.name}\n                                &lt;/Text&gt;\n                                &lt;Text style={styles.textPriceItem}&gt;\n                                    Subtotal: R$: {convertToReals(product.price * product.chosenQuantity)}\n                                &lt;/Text&gt;\n                            &lt;/View&gt;\n                            &lt;View style={styles.rightContainerItem}&gt;\n                                &lt;RectButton style={styles.reactButtonEdit}\n                                    onPress={() =&gt; { toggleModalView(), handleSelectProduct(product) }}&gt;\n                                    &lt;Feather name='edit' color='#FFF' size={35} /&gt;\n                                &lt;/RectButton&gt;\n                            &lt;/View&gt;\n                        &lt;/View&gt;\n                    )\n                })\n\n                setListProducts(listBag);\n            }\n        })();\n\n        calculateTotal();\n    }, ['', reloadList]);\n\n\n\n    const updateList = async () =&gt; {\n\n        const products = JSON.parse(await AsyncStorage.getItem('@storage_bag'));\n\n        if (products.length === 0) {\n            setListProducts(&lt;Text\n                style={{\n                    fontFamily: 'Nunito_700Bold',\n                    fontSize: 26,\n                    color: '#8FA7B2',\n                    textAlign: 'center',\n                    marginTop: 40\n                }}\n            &gt;Você não tem item na sacola.&lt;/Text&gt;)\n        } else {\n\n            const listBag = products.map((product, index) =&gt; {\n                return (\n                    &lt;View key={index} style={styles.mainItemContainer}&gt;\n                        &lt;View style={styles.leftContainerItem}&gt;\n                            &lt;Image source={product.path} style={styles.logoItem} /&gt;\n                        &lt;/View&gt;\n                        &lt;View style={styles.middleContainerItem}&gt;\n                            &lt;Text style={styles.textNameItem}&gt;\n                                {product.name}\n                            &lt;/Text&gt;\n                            &lt;Text style={styles.textPriceItem}&gt;\n                                Subtotal: R$: {convertToReals(product.price * product.chosenQuantity)}\n                            &lt;/Text&gt;\n                        &lt;/View&gt;\n                        &lt;View style={styles.rightContainerItem}&gt;\n                            &lt;TouchableHighlight style={styles.reactButtonEdit}\n                                onPress={() =&gt; { toggleModalView(), handleSelectProduct(product) }}&gt;\n                                &lt;Feather name='edit' color='#FFF' size={35} /&gt;\n                            &lt;/TouchableHighlight&gt;\n                        &lt;/View&gt;\n                    &lt;/View&gt;\n                )\n            })\n\n            setListProducts(listBag);\n        }\n    }\n\n\n    const handleChangeItem = async () =&gt; {\n\n        try {\n            const bagProdutcts = JSON.parse(await AsyncStorage.getItem('@storage_bag'));\n\n            const newListWithChangedItem = bagProdutcts.map((value, index) =&gt; {\n\n                if (value.id === selectedProduct.id) {\n\n                    value.chosenQuantity = pickerValue;\n\n                }\n\n                return value\n\n            })\n            await AsyncStorage.setItem('@storage_bag', JSON.stringify(newListWithChangedItem));\n            toggleModalView();\n            updateList();\n\n        } catch (err) {\n            console.log(err);\n        }\n    }\n\n    const handleCleanBag = async () =&gt; {\n\n        try {\n            const emptyBag = [];\n            await AsyncStorage.setItem('@storage_bag', JSON.stringify(emptyBag));\n            setListProducts([]);\n\n            Alert.alert('Todos os itens foram retirados da sacola');\n        } catch (err) {\n            console.log(err);\n            Alert.alert('Ops algum erro aconteceu contate o suporte técnico')\n        }\n    }\n\n    const handleChangeQuantity = (itemPicked) =&gt; {\n\n        setPickerValue(itemPicked);\n        const cloneSelectedProduct = { ...selectedProduct };\n        cloneSelectedProduct.chosenQuantity = itemPicked;\n        setSelectedProduct(cloneSelectedProduct);\n    }\n\n\n    return (\n        &lt;LinearGradient colors={['#00C7C7', '#FDFFFF']} style={styles.gradientContainer}&gt;\n            &lt;Modal\n                animationType=&quot;slide&quot;\n                visible={modalView}\n                transparent={true}\n            &gt;\n                &lt;View style={styles.modal}&gt;\n                    &lt;View style={styles.modalContentContainer}&gt;\n                        &lt;View style={styles.modalContentTop}&gt;\n                            &lt;TouchableHighlight\n                                style={styles.closeButtonModal}\n                                onPress={toggleModalView}\n                            &gt;\n                                &lt;Feather name='x' size={62} color='#FFF' /&gt;\n                            &lt;/TouchableHighlight&gt;\n                            &lt;View style={styles.modalContentLogo}&gt;\n                                &lt;Image source={selectedProduct.path} /&gt;\n                            &lt;/View&gt;\n                            &lt;View style={styles.modalContentTopTexts}&gt;\n                                &lt;Text style={styles.modalItemName}&gt;{selectedProduct.name}&lt;/Text&gt;\n                                &lt;Text style={styles.modalItemPrice}&gt;Preço: {selectedProduct.price}/kg&lt;/Text&gt;\n                            &lt;/View&gt;\n                        &lt;/View&gt;\n                        &lt;View style={styles.modalContentBottom}&gt;\n                            &lt;View style={styles.modalContentQuantity}&gt;\n                                &lt;Text style={styles.modalItemPrice}&gt;Quantidade:&lt;/Text&gt;\n                                &lt;View style={styles.modalContentQuantityBorder}&gt;\n                                    &lt;Picker\n                                        itemStyle={{ backgroundColor: &quot;grey&quot;, color: &quot;blue&quot;, fontFamily: &quot;Ebrima&quot;, fontSize: 17 }}\n                                        mode='dropdown'\n                                        dropdownIconColor='#8FA7B2'\n                                        selectedValue={pickerValue}\n                                        onValueChange={((itemPicked) =&gt; { handleChangeQuantity(itemPicked) })}\n                                        style={styles.picker}\n                                    &gt;\n                                        &lt;Picker.Item label='0.5' value={0.5} color='#8FA7B2' style={styles.pickerItem} /&gt;\n                                        &lt;Picker.Item label='1' value={1} color='#8FA7B2' /&gt;\n                                        &lt;Picker.Item label=&quot;1.5&quot; value={1.5} color='#8FA7B2' /&gt;\n                                        &lt;Picker.Item label=&quot;2&quot; value={2} color='#8FA7B2' /&gt;\n                                        &lt;Picker.Item label=&quot;2.5&quot; value={2.5} color='#8FA7B2' /&gt;\n                                        &lt;Picker.Item label=&quot;3&quot; value={3} color='#8FA7B2' /&gt;\n                                        &lt;Picker.Item label=&quot;4&quot; value={4} color='#8FA7B2' /&gt;\n                                        &lt;Picker.Item label=&quot;5&quot; value={5} color='#8FA7B2' /&gt;\n                                    &lt;/Picker&gt;\n                                &lt;/View&gt;\n                                &lt;Text style={styles.modalItemPrice}&gt;KG&lt;/Text&gt;\n                            &lt;/View&gt;\n                            &lt;View style={styles.modalContentValue}&gt;\n                                &lt;Text style={styles.modalPriceValue}&gt;Valor: R$: &lt;/Text&gt;\n                                &lt;Text style={styles.modalPriceValue}&gt;{convertToReals(selectedProduct.price * selectedProduct.chosenQuantity)}&lt;/Text&gt;\n                            &lt;/View&gt;\n                            &lt;View style={styles.modalContentButtons}&gt;\n                                &lt;TouchableOpacity style={styles.changeItemButton}\n                                    onPress={() =&gt; handleChangeItem()}&gt;\n                                    &lt;Text style={styles.changeItemButtonText}&gt;Mudar Item&lt;/Text&gt;\n                                &lt;/TouchableOpacity&gt;\n                                &lt;View style={styles.borderTakeOffButton}&gt;\n                                    &lt;RectButton style={styles.takeOffBag}&gt;\n                                        &lt;Text style={styles.takeOffBagButtonText}&gt;Tirar da sacola&lt;/Text&gt;\n                                        &lt;Feather name='x' size={44} color='#FF84A9' /&gt;\n                                    &lt;/RectButton&gt;\n                                &lt;/View&gt;\n                            &lt;/View&gt;\n                        &lt;/View&gt;\n                    &lt;/View&gt;\n                &lt;/View&gt;\n            &lt;/Modal&gt;\n            &lt;View style={styles.contentContainer}&gt;\n                &lt;Text style={styles.textTitle}&gt;Aqui esta sua sacola&lt;/Text&gt;\n                &lt;View style={styles.scrollContainer}&gt;\n                    &lt;ScrollView style={styles.scroll}&gt;\n                        {listProducts}\n                    &lt;/ScrollView&gt;\n                    &lt;View style={styles.totalContainer}&gt;\n                        &lt;Text style={styles.totalText}&gt;Total: R$: {convertToReals(totalPrice)}&lt;/Text&gt;\n                    &lt;/View&gt;\n                &lt;/View&gt;\n            &lt;/View&gt;\n            &lt;View&gt;\n                &lt;RectButton style={styles.orderButton}&gt;\n                    &lt;Text style={styles.orderButtonText}&gt;Fazer Pedido&lt;/Text&gt;\n                    &lt;Feather name='send' size={35} color='#FFF' /&gt;\n                &lt;/RectButton&gt;\n\n                &lt;TouchableOpacity style={styles.cleanBagButton}\n                    onPress={() =&gt; handleCleanBag()}&gt;\n                    &lt;Text style={styles.cleanBagButtonText}&gt;Limpar Sacola&lt;/Text&gt;\n                    &lt;Feather name='x' size={48} color='#F97099' /&gt;\n                &lt;/TouchableOpacity&gt;\n\n            &lt;/View&gt;\n        &lt;/LinearGradient&gt;\n    )\n}\n\nconst styles = StyleSheet.create({\n    gradientContainer: {\n        flex: 1,\n        alignItems: 'center',\n    },\n    contentContainer: {\n        borderRadius: 20,\n        height: '65%',\n        width: '95%',\n        backgroundColor: '#A1F5F5',\n        alignItems: 'center',\n        marginTop: 20\n    },\n    textTitle: {\n        fontSize: 26,\n        fontFamily: 'Nunito_700Bold',\n        color: '#8FA7B2',\n        marginTop: 40\n    },\n    scrollContainer: {\n        height: '75%',\n        borderRadius: 20,\n (\n                &lt;&gt;\n                  &lt;WiDaySunny size={40} style={{ color: &quot;#f7f7f7&quot; }} /&gt;\n                  &lt;span&gt;Light&lt;/span&gt;\n                &lt;/&gt;\n              ) : (\n                &lt;&gt;\n                  &lt;WiMoonWaxingCrescent5\n                    size={40}\n                    style={{ color: &quot;#006790&quot; }}\n                  /&gt;\n                  &lt;span&gt;Dark&lt;/span&gt;\n                &lt;/&gt;\n              )}\n            &lt;/span&gt;\n            &lt;Title /&gt;\n          &lt;/&gt;\n        )}\n\n        &lt;Home /&gt;\n      &lt;/div&gt;\n    &lt;/React.Fragment&gt;\n  );\n}\n\nexport default App;\n</code></pre>\n<p>Home.js</p>\n<pre><code>import React from &quot;react&quot;;\nimport $ from &quot;jquery&quot;;\nimport ReactNotification, { store } from &quot;react-notifications-component&quot;;\nimport Card from &quot;./Card/Card&quot;;\n\nimport &quot;react-notifications-component/dist/theme.css&quot;;\n\nfunction Home() {\n  console.log(&quot;Home&quot;);\n  function scrollNotification() {\n    console.log(&quot;Notification&quot;);\n    $(window).on(&quot;load&quot;, () =&gt; {\n      store.addNotification({\n        title: &quot;Notification from ACM Vote!&quot;,\n        message:\n          &quot;This website is still in progress.\\nThank you for visiting!!! &quot;3&quot;\n</code></pre>\n<p>UPDATE 1:\nSo I have this to make it into JSON, and then POST it:</p>\n<pre><code>//url is the api\nasync function postFormDataAsJson({ url, formData }) {\n    const plainFormData = Object.fromEntries(formData.entries());\n    \n//put all accountsToLink value into an array\nplainFormData[&quot;accountsToLink&quot;] = new Array //create array\n$(&quot;input[name=accountsToLink] &quot;).each(function() {\nplainFormData[&quot;accountsToLink&quot;].push($(this).val()) //push value in array\n});\n\n    const formDataJsonString = JSON.stringify(plainFormData);\n    const fetchOptions = {\n        method: &quot;POST&quot;,\n        headers: {\n            &quot;Content-Type&quot;: &quot;application/json&quot;,\n            Accept: &quot;application/json&quot;,\n        },\n        body: formDataJsonString,\n    };\n    const response = await fetch(url, fetchOptions);\n    if (!response.ok) {\n        const errorMessage = await response.text();\n        throw new Error(errorMessage);\n    }\n    else if (response.ok) {\n        window.location.href = &quot;confirmation.html&quot;;\n    }\n    return response.json();\n}\n\n\n\nasync function handleFormSubmit(event) {\n    event.preventDefault();\n    const form = event.currentTarget;\n    const url = form.action;\n    try {\n        const formData = new FormData(form);\n        const responseData = await postFormDataAsJson({ url, formData });\n        console.log({ responseData });\n    } catch (error) {\n        console.error(error);\n    }\n}\nconst testform = document.getElementById('testform');\ntestform.addEventListener('submit', handleFormSubmit);\n</code></pre>\n","userId":1,"threadId":339,"question_id":65003648,"isQuestion":true,"score":0},

{"body":"<p>I am attempting to add a score to a rock paper scissors game using React. I am very new to react, so not quite sure am i implementing it properly.</p>\n<pre><code>class App extends Component {\nstate = {\n    playerOne: weapons[0],\n    computer: weapons[0],\n    winner: &quot;&quot;,\n    playerWins: 0,\n    computerWins: 0,\n    draws :0\n\n};\n\nstartGame = () =&gt; {\n    let counter = 0;\n    let gameInterval = setInterval(() =&gt; {\n        counter ++;\n        this.setState({\n            computer: weapons[Math.floor(Math.random() * weapons.length)],\n            winner: &quot;&quot;,\n            playerWins: 0,\n            computerWins: 0,\n            draws :0\n        });\n        if (counter &gt; 5) {\n            clearInterval(gameInterval);\n            this.setState({\n                winner: this.Winner()\n            });\n        }\n    }, 250);\n};\n\nWinner = () =&gt; {\n    const { playerOne, computer } = this.state;\n\n    if (playerOne === computer){\n        draws++;\n        return &quot;It's a Draw!!&quot;;\n\n    } else if (\n        (playerOne === &quot;rock&quot; &amp;&amp; computer === &quot;scissors&quot;) ||\n        (playerOne === &quot;scissors&quot; &amp;&amp; computer === &quot;paper&quot;) ||\n        (playerOne === &quot;paper&quot; &amp;&amp; computer === &quot;rock&quot;)\n    ) {\n        playerWins++;\n        return &quot;Player One Wins!&quot;\n        \n    } else {\n        computerWins++\n        return &quot;The computer Wins!&quot;\n    }\n};\n\nselectWeapon = weapon =&gt; {\n    this.setState({\n        playerOne: weapon,\n        winner: &quot;&quot;,\n        score: 0\n    });\n};\n\nrender() {\n    const { playerOne, computer, winner, score } = this.state;\n    return (\n      &lt;&gt;\n        &lt;h1 style={{ textAlign: &quot;center&quot; }}&gt;Rock Paper Scissors&lt;/h1&gt;\n\n        &lt;div&gt;\n          &lt;Player weapon={playerOne} /&gt;\n          &lt;Player weapon={computer} /&gt;\n        &lt;/div&gt;\n        &lt;div&gt;\n          &lt;button\n            className=&quot;weaponBtn&quot;\n            onClick={() =&gt; this.selectWeapon(&quot;rock&quot;)}\n          &gt;\n            rock\n          &lt;/button&gt;\n          &lt;button\n            className=&quot;weaponBtn&quot;\n            onClick={() =&gt; this.selectWeapon(&quot;paper&quot;)}\n          &gt;\n            paper\n          &lt;/button&gt;\n          &lt;button\n            className=&quot;weaponBtn&quot;\n            onClick={() =&gt; onClick={this.startGame}&gt;\n          Start!\n        &lt;/button&gt;\n      &lt;/&gt;\n    );\n  }\n}\n\nconst rootElement = document.getElementById(&quot;root&quot;);\nReactDOM.render(&lt;App /&gt;, rootElement);**strong text**\n</code></pre>\n<p>I'm having a problem where the score increments by two, if it is a draw, computer wins or the player wins. <strong>which type</strong> of code that specifies the color of the newly added event.</p>\n<pre><code>\nvar GLOBAL = {\n  //the id of the form we will use to create calendar events \n  formId : &quot;xxx&quot;,  \n  \n  //the id of the calendar we will create events on\n  calendarId : &quot;xxx&quot;,\n  \n  //a mapping of form item titles to sections of the calendar event\n  formMap : {\n    eventTitle: &quot;Mille võtad&quot;,\n    startTime : &quot;Millal võtad&quot;,\n    endTime: &quot;Mis ajal tagastad&quot;,\n    description: &quot;Märkused, lisainfo&quot;,\n    location: &quot;Asutus&quot;,\n    email: &quot;Kes võtab&quot;,\n  },\n}\n\nfunction onFormSubmit() {\n  var eventObject = getFormResponse();\n  var event = createCalendarEvent(eventObject);\n}\n\nfunction getFormResponse() {\n  // Get a form object by opening the form using the\n  // form id stored in the GLOBAL variable object\n  var form = FormApp.openById(GLOBAL.formId),\n      //Get all responses from the form. \n      //This method returns an array of form responses\n      responses = form.getResponses(),\n      //find the length of the responses array\n      length = responses.length,\n      //find the index of the most recent form response\n      //since arrays are zero indexed, the last response \n      //is the total number of responses minus one\n      lastResponse = responses[length-1],\n      //get an array of responses to every question item \n      //within the form for which the respondent provided an answer\n      itemResponses = lastResponse.getItemResponses(),\n      //create an empty object to store data from the last \n      //form response\n      //that will be used to create a calendar event\n      eventObject = {};\n  //Loop through each item response in the item response array\n  for (var i = 0, x = itemResponses.length; i&lt;x; i++) {\n    //Get the title of the form item being iterated on\n    var thisItem = itemResponses[i].getItem().getTitle(),\n        //get the submitted response to the form item being\n        //iterated on\n        thisResponse = itemResponses[i].getResponse();\n    //based on the form question title, map the response of the \n    //item being iterated on into our eventObject variable\n    //use the GLOBAL variable formMap sub object to match \n    //form question titles to property keys in the event object\n    switch (thisItem) {\n      case GLOBAL.formMap.eventTitle:\n        eventObject.title = thisResponse;\n        break;\n      case GLOBAL.formMap.startTime:\n        eventObject.startTime = thisResponse;\n        break;\n      case GLOBAL.formMap.endTime:\n        eventObject.endTime = thisResponse;\n        break; \n      case GLOBAL.formMap.description:\n        eventObject.description = thisResponse;\n        break;\n      case GLOBAL.formMap.location:\n        eventObject.location = thisResponse;\n        break;\n      case GLOBAL.formMap.email:\n        eventObject.email = thisResponse;\n        break;\n    } \n  }\n  return eventObject;\n}\n\nfunction createCalendarEvent(eventObject) {\n  //Get a calendar object by opening the calendar using the\n  //calendar id stored in the GLOBAL variable object\n  var calendar = CalendarApp.getCalendarById(GLOBAL.calendarId),\n      //The title for the event that will be created\n      title = eventObject.title,\n      //The start time and date of the event that will be created\n      startTime = moment(eventObject.startTime).toDate(),\n      //The end time and date of the event that will be created\n      endTime = moment(eventObject.endTime).toDate();\n  \n  //an options object containing the description and guest list\n  //for the event that will be created\n  var eventColour = 1\n  var options = {\n    description : eventObject.description,\n    guests : eventObject.email,\n    location: eventObject.location,\n  };\n  try {\n    //create a calendar event with given title, start time,\n    //end time, and description and guests stored in an \n    //options argument\n    var event = calendar.createEvent(title, startTime, \n                                     endTime, options, eventColour)\n      event.setColor = ('5');\n      colorID = 1\n    } catch (e) {\n      //delete the guest property from the options variable, \n      //as an invalid email address with cause this method to \n      //throw an error.\n      delete options.guests\n      //create the event without including the guest\n      var event = calendar.createEvent(title, startTime, \n                                       endTime, options)\n      }\n  return event;   \n}\n\n</code></pre>\n","userId":1,"threadId":349,"question_id":65003418,"isQuestion":true,"score":0},

need.</p>\n<p>HTML</p>\n<p><div class=\"snippet\" data-lang=\"js\" data-hide=\"false\" data-console=\"true\" data-babel=\"false\">\r\n<div class=\"snippet-code\">\r\n<pre class=\"snippet-code-css font-family: 'FjallaOne-Regular', sans-serif;\n  color: #333;\n  margin: 0;\n}\na {\n  text-decoration: none;\n}\n\n\nheader {\n  display: -webkit-flex;\n  display: -moz-flex;\n  display: -ms-flex;\n  display: -o-flex;\n  display: flex;\n  justify-content: space-between;\n  align-items: center;\n  color: #be0000;\n  background: #FFFFFF;\n  padding: 30px 70px;\n  border-bottom: 2px groove;\n  border-bottom-color: #081A40;\n}\n\n.logo{\n  cursor:pointer;\n}\n\n.header-heading {\n  margin: 0;\n  max-width: 300px;\n  margin-left: 0;\n  max-height: 300px;\n}\n\n\n\n.nav-bar{\nlist-style: #081A40;\ntext-align: center;\n\n}\n\n.btn-area:hover {\nbackground: #A60311;\n\n}\n\n.flexcontainer {\n \ndisplay: flex;\nalign-items: center;\njustify-content: center;\nflex-direction:row;\nwidth: flex-direction: row;\n\n  \n}\n.box2 {\n  background-color: blue;\n  text-align: center;\n  color: white;\n  width: 100px;\n  height: 100px;\n  margin: 10px;\n  padding: 5px;\n  flex-basis: 300px;\n {"body":"<p>This app is a calendar for managing events, I'm using .NET core and javascript for the front-end and a SQL Table for storing the events.</p>\n<p>I can click on the different days in the calendar and create new events, I can create events from 1 to 12 of every month if I try to create an event beyond the 12 of each month I get this error:</p>\n<p>&quot;Failed to convert parameter value from a String to a DateTime&quot;</p>\n<p>Every event between 1 and 12 is correctly saved in the DB but only the events of the type 9/9/yyyy, 10/10/yyy, 11/11/yyyy can get and remains in the UI.\nNow I have cleared the wrong date format somewhere because i need the MM/DD/YYYY format and maybe in the DB the DateTime format is DD/MM/YYYY, how can i solve this? should i change the DB DateTime format? how?\nor i need to do some conversion in the front-end?\nthis is the Event Class</p>\n<pre><code>    public class Event\n    {\n        public int EventId { get; set; }\n        public string Title { get; set; }\n        public string Description { get; set; }\n        public string Start { get; set; }\n        public string End { get; set; }\n        public bool AllDay { get; set; }\n    }\n}\n</code></pre>\n<p>this is the event table in the DB</p>\n<pre><code> CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Events] (\n    [event_id]    INT           IDENTITY (1, 1) NOT NULL,\n    [title]       VARCHAR (300) NOT NULL,\n    [description] VARCHAR (MAX) NOT NULL,\n    [event_start] DATETIME      NOT NULL,\n    [event_end]   DATETIME      NULL,\n    [all_day]     BIT           NOT NULL,\n    PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ([event_id] ASC)\n);\n</code></pre>\n<p>this is a part of JS i use (using moment.js and JQuery too)</p>\n<pre><code>    const formatDate = date =&gt; date === null ? '' : moment(date).format(&quot;MM/DD/YYYY h:mm A&quot;);\n    const fpStartTime = flatpickr(&quot;#StartTime&quot;, {\n        enableTime: true,\n        dateFormat: &quot;m/d/Y h:i K&quot;\n    });\n    const fpEndTime = flatpickr(&quot;#EndTime&quot;, {\n        enableTime: true,\n        dateFormat: &quot;m/d/Y h:i K&quot;\n});\n</code></pre>\n<p>this is the DataAccessLayer in C# where i speak with the DB</p>\n<pre><code>public class DA\n    {\n        public string _ConnectionStrVC { get; set; }\n\n        public DA(string ConnectionStrVC) {\n            _ConnectionStrVC = ConnectionStrVC;\n        }\n\n        private SqlConnection GetConnection() {\n            SqlConnection conn = new SqlConnection(_ConnectionStrVC);\n            conn.Open();\n\n            return conn;\n        }\n\n        private void CloseConnection(SqlConnection conn) {\n            conn.Close();\n        }\n        \n        public List&lt;Event&gt; GetCalendarEvents(string start, string end) {\n            List&lt;Event&gt; events = new List&lt;Event&gt;();\n\n            using (SqlConnection conn = GetConnection()) {\n                using (SqlCommand cmd = new SqlCommand(@&quot;select\n                                                            event_id\n                                                            ,title\n                                                            ,[description]\n                                                            ,event_start\n                                                            ,event_end\n                                                            ,all_day\n                                                        from\n                                                            [Events]\n                                                        where\n                                                            event_start between @start and @end&quot;, conn) {\n                    CommandType = CommandType.Text\n                }) {\n                    cmd.Parameters.Add(&quot;@start&quot;, SqlDbType.VarChar).Value = start;\n                    cmd.Parameters.Add(&quot;@end&quot;, SqlDbType.VarChar).Value = end;\n\n                    using (SqlDataReader dr = cmd.ExecuteReader()) {\n                        while (dr.Read()) {\n                            events.Add(new Event() {\n                                EventId = Convert.ToInt32(dr[&quot;event_id&quot;]),\n                                Title = Convert.ToString(dr[&quot;title&quot;]),\n                                Description = Convert.ToString(dr[&quot;description&quot;]),\n                                Start = Convert.ToString(dr[&quot;event_start&quot;]),\n                                End = Convert.ToString(dr[&quot;event_end&quot;]),\n                                AllDay = Convert.ToBoolean(dr[&quot;all_day&quot;])\n                            });\n                            \n                        }\n                        \n                    }\n                }\n            }\n\n            Console.WriteLine(events);\n            return events;\n        }\n\n        public string UpdateEvent(Event evt) {\n            string message = &quot;&quot;;\n            SqlConnection conn = GetConnection();\n            SqlTransaction trans = conn.BeginTransaction();\n\n            try {\n                SqlCommand cmd = new SqlCommand(@&quot;update\n                                                    [Events]\n                                                set\n                                                    [description]=@description\n                                                    ,title=@title\n                                                    ,event_start=@start\n                                                    ,event_end=@end \n                                                    ,all_day=@allDay\n                                                where\n                                                    event_id=@eventId&quot;, conn, trans) {\n                    CommandType = CommandType.Text\n                };\n                cmd.Parameters.Add(&quot;@eventId&quot;, SqlDbType.Int).Value = evt.EventId;\n                cmd.Parameters.Add(&quot;@title&quot;, SqlDbType.VarChar).Value = evt.Title;\n                cmd.Parameters.Add(&quot;@description&quot;, SqlDbType.VarChar).Value = evt.Description;\n                cmd.Parameters.Add(&quot;@start&quot;, SqlDbType.DateTime).Value = evt.Start;\n                cmd.Parameters.Add(&quot;@end&quot;, SqlDbType.DateTime).Value = Helpers.ToDBNullOrDefault(evt.End);\n                cmd.Parameters.Add(&quot;@allDay&quot;, SqlDbType.Bit).Value = evt.AllDay;\n                cmd.ExecuteNonQuery();\n\n                trans.Commit();\n            } catch (Exception exp) {\n                trans.Rollback();\n                message = exp.Message;\n            } finally {\n                CloseConnection(conn);\n            }\n\n            return message;\n        }\n\n        public string AddEvent(Event evt, out int eventId) {\n            string message = &quot;&quot;;\n            SqlConnection conn = GetConnection();\n            SqlTransaction trans = conn.BeginTransaction();\n            eventId = 0;\n\n            try {\n                SqlCommand cmd = new SqlCommand(@&quot;insert into [Events]\n                                                (\n                                                    title\n                                                    ,[description]\n                                                    ,event_start\n                                                    ,event_end\n                                                    ,all_day\n                                                )\n                                                values\n                                                (\n                                                    @title\n                                                    ,@description\n                                                    ,@start\n                                                    ,@end\n                                                    ,@allDay\n                                                );\n                                                select scope_identity()&quot;, conn, trans) {\n                    CommandType = CommandType.Text\n                };\n                cmd.Parameters.Add(&quot;@title&quot;, SqlDbType.VarChar).Value = evt.Title;\n                cmd.Parameters.Add(&quot;@description&quot;, SqlDbType.VarChar).Value = evt.Description;\n                cmd.Parameters.Add(&quot;@start&quot;, SqlDbType.DateTime).Value = evt.Start;\n                cmd.Parameters.Add(&quot;@end&quot;, SqlDbType.DateTime).Value = Helpers.ToDBNullOrDefault(evt.End);\n                cmd.Parameters.Add(&quot;@allDay&quot;, SqlDbType.Bit).Value = evt.AllDay;\n\n                eventId =  Convert.ToInt32(cmd.ExecuteScalar());\n\n                trans.Commit();\n            } catch (Exception exp) {\n                trans.Rollback();\n                message = exp.Message;\n            } finally {\n                CloseConnection(conn);\n            }\n\n            return message;\n        }\n\n        public string DeleteEvent(int eventId) {\n            string message = &quot;&quot;;\n            SqlConnection conn = GetConnection();\n            SqlTransaction trans = conn.BeginTransaction();\n\n            try {\n                SqlCommand cmd = new SqlCommand(@&quot;delete from \n                                                    [Events]\n                                                where\n                                                    event_id=@eventId&quot;, conn, trans) {\n                    CommandType = CommandType.Text\n                };\n                cmd.Parameters.Add(&quot;@eventId&quot;, SqlDbType.Int).Value = eventId;\n                cmd.ExecuteNonQuery();\n\n                trans.Commit();\n            } catch (Exception exp) {\n                trans.Rollback();\n                message = exp.Message;\n            } finally {\n                CloseConnection(conn);\n            }\n\n            return message;\n        }\n    }\n}\n</code></pre>\n","userId":1,"threadId":355,"question_id":65003303,"isQuestion":true,"score":0},
{"body":"<p>I would like to change the style of site by clicking the icon</p>\n<pre><code>&lt;head&gt;\n&lt;meta charset=&quot;utf-8&quot;&gt;\n&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;styled.css&quot; id=&quot;styles&quot;&gt;\n&lt;/head&gt;\n</code></pre>\n<p>It's hard for me to get into href. {"body":"<p>I'm using images to click on and open modals with different content inside. You can see the website <a href=\"https://radiogardening.space/\" rel=\"nofollow noreferrer\">here</a>. add them into the modal boxes?</p>\n<p>Thanks!</p>\n<p><div class=\"snippet\" data-lang=\"js\" data-hide=\"false\" data-console=\"true\" data-babel=\"false\">\r\n<div class=\"snippet-code\">\r\n<pre class=\"snippet-code-js lang-js prettyprint-override\"><code>var modal = document.getElementById(\"myModal\");\nvar img = document.querySelectorAll(\".myImg\");\nvar modalImg = document.getElementById(\"img01\");\nvar captionText = document.getElementById(\"caption\");\n\nconst img_modal = ['https://static3.depositphotos.com/1000992/133/i/600/depositphotos_1337508-stock-photo-a-free-flying-white-dove.jpg',\n'https://i.pinimg.com/474x/9c/a1/7e/9ca17e8e343e1ebfee9a463fc4ec22fe.jpg', \n'https://everskate.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/how-to-kickflip-trick-tip-600x336.jpg'];\n\nArray.from(img).forEach(function(imgArray, i) {\n  imgArray.onclick = function(){\n    let default_image = this.src;\n    modal.style.display = \"block\";\n    this.src = img_modal[i];\n    modalImg.src = this.src;\n    this.src = default_image;\n    captionText.innerHTML = this.alt;\n  }\n});\n\n\nvar span = document.getElementsByClassName(\"close\")[0];\nspan.onclick = function() { \n  modal.style.display = \"none\";\n}</code></pre>\r\n<pre class=\"snippet-code-css lang-css prettyprint-override\"><code>.myImg {\n  border-radius: 5px;\n  cursor: pointer;\n  transition: 0.3s;\n}\n\n.myImg:hover {opacity: 0.7;}\n\n/* The Modal (background) */\n.modal {\n  display: none; /* Hidden by default */\n  position: fixed; /* Stay in place */\n  z-index: 1; /* Sit on top */\n  padding-top: 100px; /* Location of the box */\n  left: 0;\n  top: 0;\n  width: 100%; /* Full width */\n  height: 100%; /* Full height */\n  overflow: auto; /* Enable scroll if needed */\n  background-color: rgb(0,0,0); /* Fallback color */\n  background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.9); /* Black w/ opacity */\n}\n\n/* Modal Content (image) */\n.modal-content {\n  margin: auto;\n  display: block;\n  width: 80%;\n  max-width: 700px;\n}\n\n/* Caption of Modal Image */\n#caption {\n  margin: auto;\n {"body":"<p>Script: NewsletterScript.js</p>\n<pre><code>function formValidation() {\n    var fname = document.getElementById('firstName').value;\n    var lname = document.getElementById('lastName').value;\n    var pnumber = document.getElementById('phoneNumber').value;\n    var email = document.getElementById('e-mail').value;\n  if (FirstName(fname)) {\n  }\n  if (LastName(lname)) {\n  }\n  if (Country(country)) {\n  }\n  if (Email(email)) {\n  }\n  return false;\n}\n/*first name input validation*/\nfunction FirstName(fname) {\n  var message = document.getElementsByClassName(&quot;error-message&quot;);\n  var letters = /^[A-Za-z]+$/;\n  if ( fname ==&quot;&quot; || fname.match(letters)) {\n    text=&quot;&quot;;\n    message[0].innerHTML = text;\n    return true;\n  }\n  else {\n    text=&quot;First name should contain only letters&quot;;\n    message[0].innerHTML = text;\n    return false;\n  }\n}\n/*last name input validation*/\nfunction  LastName(lname) {\n  var message = document.getElementsByClassName(&quot;error-message&quot;);\n  var letters = /^[A-Za-z]+$/;\n  if ( lname ==&quot;&quot; || lname.match(letters)) {\n    text=&quot;&quot;;\n    message[1].innerHTML = text;\n    return true;\n  }\n  else {\n    text=&quot;Last name should contain only letters&quot;;\n    message[1].innerHTML = text;\n    return false;\n  }\n}\n</code></pre>\n<p>I'm trying to get this validation to loop until the criteria is fulfilled, currently this is only working once and if the button is clicked again it submits regardless. {"body":"<p>On my script I use</p>\n<pre><code>for (var i in $scope.hulls) {\nif ($scope.hulls[i].id == 1234) {\nconsole.log($scope.hulls[i]);\n$scope.selectedHullShip1 = $scope.hulls[i];\n }\n}\n</code></pre>\n<p>now, outside of the onclick button it works, but inside the onclick button it doesn't and i cant seem to work out why. My knowledge is limited and I am learning as I go.</p>\n<p>The snippet below is with the code outside of the onclick and works perfectly as I have mentioned. Using the console log, I did work out it was this bit of the code that doesn't run ;-</p>\n<p>$scope.selectedHullShip1 = $scope.hulls[i];</p>\n<p>here is the fiddle also for you to look at <a }],\n        }\n    }\n\n    onSubmit = (e) =&gt; {\n        console.log('data : ', this.state.inputList[0]);\n    }\n\n     handleChange = (e) =&gt; {\n         if ([&quot;desc&quot;, &quot;file&quot;].includes(e.target.name)) {\n             let Desc = [...this.state.inputList]\n             inputList[e.target.dataset.id][e.target.name] = e.target.value;\n         } else {\n             this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value })\n         }\n     }\n\n    addNewRow = (e) =&gt; {\n    this.setState((prevState) =&gt; ({\n    inputList: [...prevState.inputList, { index: Math.random(), desc: &quot;&quot;, file: &quot;&quot; }],\n       }));\n    }\n\n     deteteRow = (index) =&gt; {\n        this.setState({\n             inputList: this.state.inputList.filter((s, sindex) =&gt; index !== sindex),\n         });\n     }\n\n    clickOnDelete(record) {\n       this.setState({\n          inputList: this.state.inputList.filter(r =&gt; r !== record)\n      });\n    }\n\n    render() {\n        let { inputList, flag } = this.state\n        return (\n            &lt;Fragment&gt;\n                &lt;div className=&quot;container-fluid&quot;&gt;\n                    &lt;div className=&quot;row&quot;&gt;\n                        &lt;div className=&quot;col-sm-12&quot;&gt;\n                            &lt;div className=&quot;card&quot;&gt;\n                                &lt;div className=&quot;card-body&quot;&gt;\n                                    &lt;form className=&quot;needs-validation&quot; onChange={this.handleChange}&gt;\n           &lt;div className=&quot;form-group row&quot;&gt;\n             &lt;label className=&quot;col-xl-3 col-md-3&quot;&gt;Details&lt;/label&gt;\n                 &lt;div className=&quot;col-9 col-md-9&quot;&gt;\n                    &lt;table className=&quot;table&quot;&gt;\n                        &lt;tbody&gt;\n                          &lt;Details add={this.addNewRow} delete={this.clickOnDelete.bind(this)} Desc ={inputList} /&gt;\n                        &lt;/tbody&gt;\n                    &lt;/table&gt;\n                &lt;/div&gt;\n            &lt;/div&gt;\n                &lt;div className=&quot;pull-right&quot;&gt;\n                       &lt;button type=&quot;button&quot; {"body":"<p>I want to change the color of keywords of given sentence. {"body":"<p>i have a byte array created in c# from <code>object</code> type and then send it over socket protocol to a Node js app, but unable to deserialize the data to readable object. what is the way to decode this data?</p>\n<p>C# serializing code:</p>\n<pre><code>private static byte[] ToBytes(object message)\n{\n    IFormatter br = new BinaryFormatter();\n    byte[] keyAsBytes = null;\n    using (var ms = new MemoryStream())\n    {\n        br.Serialize(ms, message);\n        keyAsBytes = ms.ToArray();\n    }\n    return keyAsBytes;\n}\n\nobject o = 801507;\nbyte[] AsBytes =  ToBytes(o);\n// send AsBytes\n</code></pre>\n<p>And in node js i try to decode the data</p>\n<pre><code>function handleMessage(message) {\n    console.log(message.toString());\n}\n</code></pre>\n<p>And the above code print me <code>{&quot;type&quot;:&quot;Buffer&quot;,&quot;data&quot;:[0,1,0,0,0,255,255,255,255,1,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,4,1,0,0,0,12,83,121,115,116,101,109,46,73,110,116,54,52,1,0,0,0,7,109,95,118,97,108,117,101,0,9,227,58,12,0,0,0,0,0,11]}</code></p>\n<p>so what is the right way to get the origin value ?</p>\n","userId":1,"threadId":367,"question_id":65002956,"isQuestion":true,"score":0},
{"body":"<br>\nI've found this sample snippets <a href=\"https://scoutapm.com/blog/nodejs-architecture-and-12-best-practices-for-nodejs-development#practice5\" rel=\"nofollow noreferrer\">in this article</a> :\n<pre><code>&lt;script&gt;\n    async function get_data() { // async function\n        await $.get('https://url.com/one')\n        await $.get('https://url.com/two')\n        let res = await $.get('https://url.com/three')\n        console.log(res)\n    }\n&lt;/script&gt;\n</code></pre>\n<br>\n<p>Which is the promised version of :</p>\n<pre><code>&lt;script&gt;\n    function get_data() {\n        $.get('https://url.com/one', () =&gt; {\n            $.get('https://url.com/two', () =&gt; {\n                $.get('https://url.com/three', (res) =&gt; {\n                    console.log(res)\n                })\n            })\n        })\n    }\n&lt;/script&gt;\n</code></pre>\n<br>\nMy question being, in the promised version, can we turn <code>await $.get('https://url.com/one')</code> into <code><strike>await</strike> $.get('https://url.com/one')</code> as it is the first promise?<br>\nIf yes, why would either one of both be considered as best practice?<br>\nThank you in advance\n","userId":1,"threadId":368,"question_id":65002932,"isQuestion":true,"score":0},
{"body":"<p>Im fairly new in the programming world. I'm making an app where it should be possible to choose a directory, where to save some generated files.</p>\n<p>I'm working with the ipc, and it seems like some of the code works, but it looks like i can't get the mainIpc to send the path back to the renderer.</p>\n<p>I hope the hive can help, thanks in advance!</p>\n<p><strong>Renderer:</strong></p>\n<pre><code>const electron = require(&quot;electron&quot;);\nconst ipc = require(&quot;electron&quot;).ipcRenderer;    \n\ncreateBtn.addEventListener(&quot;click&quot;, (event) =&gt; {\nipc.send(&quot;path:get&quot;);\n});\n\nipc.on(&quot;path:selected&quot;, function (path) {\nconsole.log(&quot;Full path: &quot;, path);\n});\n</code></pre>\n<p><strong>Main</strong></p>\n<pre><code>const ipc = require(&quot;electron&quot;).ipcMain;\nconst os = require(&quot;os&quot;);\nconst { dialog } = require(&quot;electron&quot;);\n\nipc.on(&quot;path:get&quot;, function (event) {\nif (os.platform() === &quot;linux&quot; || os.platform() === &quot;win32&quot;) {\n    dialog.showOpenDialog(\n        {\n            properties: [&quot;openFile&quot;],\n        },\n        function (files) {\n            if (files) win.webContents.send(&quot;path:selected&quot;, files[0]);\n            console.log(&quot;SENT&quot;);\n        }\n    );\n} else {\n    dialog.showOpenDialog(\n        {\n            properties: [&quot;openFile&quot;, &quot;openDirectory&quot;],\n        },\n        function (files) {\n            if (files) win.webContents.send(&quot;path:selected&quot;, files[0]);\n            console.log(&quot;SENT&quot;);\n        }\n    );\n}\n});\n</code></pre>\n<p>Edit: Adding the setup\n<strong>Setup</strong></p>\n<pre><code>const { app, BrowserWindow } = require(&quot;electron&quot;);\n\nconst ipc = require(&quot;electron&quot;).ipcMain;\nconst os = require(&quot;os&quot;);\nconst { dialog } = require(&quot;electron&quot;);\n\ntry {\n    require(&quot;electron-reloader&quot;)(module);\n} catch (_) {}\n\nlet win;\n\nfunction createWindow() {\nwin = new BrowserWindow({\n    width: 800,\n    height: 600,\n    webPreferences: {\n        nodeIntegration: true,\n    },\n});\n\nwin.loadFile(&quot;./src/index.html&quot;);\n}\n\napp.whenReady().then(createWindow);\n\napp.on(&quot;window-all-closed&quot;, () =&gt; {\nif (process.platform !== &quot;darwin&quot;) {\n    app.quit();\n}\n});\n\napp.on(&quot;activate&quot;, () =&gt; {\nif (BrowserWindow.getAllWindows().length === 0) {\n    createWindow();\n}\n});\n\n\n\n    \n</code></pre>\n","userId":1,"threadId":369,"question_id":65002896,"isQuestion":true,"score":0},
{"body":"<p>I have the following useEffect hook including an event listener which is not working on IE 11.</p>\n<pre><code>export function BigList({list, style}) {\n\n    const ref = useRef({})\n\n    useEffect(function() {\n        const bg = document.querySelector('.background'),\n            panel = ref.current\n\n        console.log('start function')\n\n        let colored = false\n\n        function onScroll() {\n\n            const {top, height} = panel.getBoundingClientRect()\n\n            console.log('scrolling', top)\n\n            if (top - height * 0.6 &lt;= 0 &amp;&amp; top + height * 0.4 &gt;= 0 &amp;&amp; !colored) {\n                bg.classList.add(&quot;bg-colored&quot;)\n                bg.classList.add(&quot;bg-animate&quot;)\n                colored = true\n            } else if ((top - height * 0.6 &gt; 0 || top + height * 0.4 &lt; 0) &amp;&amp; colored) {\n                bg.classList.remove(&quot;bg-colored&quot;)\n                setTimeout(function() {\n                    bg.classList.remove(&quot;bg-animate&quot;)\n                }, 500)\n                colored = false\n            }\n        }\n\n        window.addEventListener(&quot;scroll&quot;, onScroll)\n        return function() {\n            window.removeEventListener(&quot;scroll&quot;, onScroll)\n        }\n    }, [])\n\n    return (\n        &lt;div className=&quot;big-list panel z&quot; id=&quot;why&quot; style={style} ref={ref}&gt;\n            ....\n        &lt;/div&gt;\n    )\n}\n</code></pre>\n<p>It's working fine on any browser, but not for IE. - It's not even logging <code>start</code> - how so? {"body":"<p>I have my Ajax. method within Symfony which sends id of the clicked button in specific table row.</p>\n<p>My error log returns:</p>\n<blockquote>\n<p>Call to a member function changeStatus() on null</p>\n</blockquote>\n<p>This is strange, because when I <strong>dump($id)</strong> in my Controller, it's shows the id of that entity object, so I can not figure out where the problem is.</p>\n<p>This is my method:</p>\n<pre><code>/**\n  * @Route(&quot;/my-entity-route/{id}&quot;, name=&quot;change_status&quot;, options={&quot;expose&quot;=true})\n  */\n    public function changeStatus($id)\n    {\n       // dump($id);die; -- shows id number\n\n        $entity = $this-&gt;entityManager-&gt;getRepository(MyEntity::class)-&gt;find($id);\n\n        $entity-&gt;setStatus(MyEntity::STATUS_CHANGE);\n        $this-&gt;entityManager-&gt;persist($entity);\n        $this-&gt;entityManager-&gt;flush();\n    \n    }\n}\n</code></pre>\n<p>And my button:</p>\n<pre><code>&lt;button type=&quot;button&quot; data-entity_id=&quot;{{ item.id }}&quot; class=&quot;change&quot;&gt;Switch Status&lt;/button&gt;\n</code></pre>\n<p>And method in js file:</p>\n<pre><code>$(&quot;.change&quot;).click(function(ev, el){\nvar id = $(this).data(&quot;entity_id&quot;);\nif (confirm(&quot;Are you sure that you want change status?&quot;)) {\n    changeToNewStatus(id);\n }\n});\n\nfunction changeToNewStatus(id) {\n    $.ajax({\n        type: 'PATCH',\n        url: &quot;/my-entity-route/&quot;+id,\n        processData: false,\n        contentType: 'application/json-patch+json',\n        success: function () {\n            console.log('success!')\n        },\n        error: function (xhr) {\n            var err = JSON.parse(xhr.responseText);\n            alert(err.message);\n        }\n      });\n    }\n</code></pre>\n","userId":1,"threadId":374,"question_id":65002843,"isQuestion":true,"score":0},
